description: Non-Supine RDI at 3% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 3% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi3pns = 60*(hrop3 +   hnrop3 + carop3 + canop3 + oarop3 + oanop3)/(remepop+nremepop)

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-Supine RDI at 3% desat
